title: Missing `_disableInitializers()` Call in the Constructor
content:
**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `5754DB9`.

![Image 62: Alert icon](https://certificate.quantstamp.com/full/sapien/ffb7e698-6178-46f0-8df8-52e537af70c0/static/media/success-icon-alert.4e26c8d3b65fdf9f4f0789a4086052ba.svg)

**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `55c3880b64b39f94f2d85cc640940c78e3554645`. The client provided the following explanation:

> The _disableInitializers() function is now being called in the constructors which now exist.

![Image 63: Alert icon](https://certificate.quantstamp.com/full/sapien/ffb7e698-6178-46f0-8df8-52e537af70c0/static/media/success-icon-alert.4e26c8d3b65fdf9f4f0789a4086052ba.svg)

**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `55c3880b64b39f94f2d85cc640940c78e3554645`. The client provided the following explanation:

> The _disableInitializers() function is now being called in the constructors which now exist.

**File(s) affected:**`SapTestToken.sol`, `Rewards.sol`, `SapienStaking.sol`

**Description:** To prevent initialization of the implementation contract, lock it down by calling `_disableInitializers()` in the constructor. Read more in the OpenZeppelin documentation for the [initializable contract](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/5.x/api/proxy#Initializable).

**Recommendation:** Add `constructors` with a call to `_disableInitializers()` to all contracts.
